document.title: OMBI-Arabisch-Nederlands
document.intro: OMBI-Arabic-Dutch is a reversible bilingual lexical file (in Dutch, OMBI, omkeerbare bilinguale bestanden) in which Arabic is the source language and Dutch the target language. OMBI-Arabic- Dutch can be used in computational applications s... OMBI is a tool for creating and editing bilingual dictionaries The OMBI bilingual resources have been developed by order of and under the auspices of the CLVV (Commissie voor Lexicografische Vertaalvoorzieningen), which was established by the Ministers of Education of both the Netherlands and Flanders in 1993. The chairman of the CLVV was Willy Mar... OMBI-Arabic-Dutch contains 37.000 entries.

access.title: favailable for non-commercial and commercial organisations; user licence required
